alert.note: Alert for Athens; Gallia; Meigs; Morgan; Perry; Vinton; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 12:37AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Showers with strong wind gusts will impact portions of Meigs, Washington, Morgan, southeastern Perry, northeastern Gallia, east central Vinton, Athens, Wirt, northwestern Roane, Jackson, Wood, Pleasants, northeastern Mason, northwestern Ritchie and southwestern Tyler Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1235 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers 9 miles east of Athens, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parkersburg, Athens, Marietta, Belpre, Nelsonville, Ripley, St. Marys, Pomeroy, Glouster, McConnelsville, Beverly, Albany, Elizabeth, Racine, Shawnee, Coolville, Rutland, Chesterhill, Forked Run State Park and Vienna. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 126 and 186. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 15. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Athens; Gallia; Meigs; Morgan; Perry; Vinton; Washington
